object.content:
Yowzah

When I think of you I get incredibly turned on.
Just the Meir thought of being with you excites me to no end.
You give me a high mental and emotional reaction.
It makes our physical connect so much more electrified.

I have never experienced this level of desire for someone before.
There is an unseen force that is drawing me towards you.
You hold a spell over me that can’t be broken.
You’re the object of all my wants and my every desires.

When we touch each other I can feel a shimmer going down my spine to my toes.
When we’re interconnected to become one.
The sensation I feel is total ecstasy.
When I’m inside you it’s like fireworks on the Fourth of July.

The sensations we feel, the tastes we share.
To touch you in your one perfect spot.
Makes you moan loud while arching your back.
Our bodies get hotter and we get wetter as the friction between us intensifies.

You runs your nails down my back.

Your breathing gets faster and you gasp for air.
I put a hand behind your neck so I can grab your hair.

Your legs are over my shoulders and your hips are in the air.
You tell me to go harder and to go deeper.
Our bodies are glistening in the candle light.
The windows are foggy from the heat we are making.

Your moans get louder and they motivate me more.
To keep on going so you orgasm more.
One is not enough and two wont do.
We’ll keep on going until we both get dizzy.

You squeeze yourself around me to feel every pulse.
You feel me tense up inside you with every thrust.
The tension is getting intense as the sweat rolls off of us.

I flip you over so your face is down.
You put your hips in the air so I can take you from there.
I grab your hips and enter you hard.
You start to scream the harder I go.

You grab the sheets as hard as you can.
As I’m slamming in you as hard and fast as I can.
The moment gets closer and I start to throb.
You feel I’m getting close and I say don’t hold back.
Baby this is the time, to focus on the feeling.

The bed is squeaking and rocking with noise.
Our moaning is loud and almost at the peak of ecstasy.
I hear your voice between your erratic breathing.
Baby I’m cumming, baby cum with me.
I stop holding back because now is the time.

We release together, simultaneously on each other.
The release is so hard and tender too.
At this point we become vulnerable together.

We collapse into each others arms and hold each other tight.
Our kiss is so passionate there is nothing like this tender moment.
Our embrace is magical and such a perfect moment.

Our souls become one,
Our bodies are one,
Our hearts are beating together as one.
Our energy has merged into one.

We look into each others eyes and it is hard to describe.
Not a word needs to be said.
Our eyes ate revealing all to each other.

At this one moment…we have become one love. – C.Parsons
